    Data Crafts

    Welcome to Data Crafts' blog.

    Abdelkrim Hadjidj - Data Streaming Specialist

    Abdelkrim Hadjidj is a Data Streaming Specialist at Cloudera with 12 years experience on several distributed systems (big data, IoT, peer to peer and cloud). He helps customers in EMEA using open source streaming technologies such as Apache Kafka, Apache NiFi and Apache Flink to pivot into event driven organizations. He advises enterprises on defining a streaming strategy and building a central streaming platform as an asset that helps improve their customers experience, increase their agility and reduce costs.

    Previously, he held several positions including Big Data Lead at Atos, CTO at Artheamis, and Software Engineer at several companies. In the course of those roles, he designed and built several scalable data-intensive platforms for customers in Financial Services, Manufacuturing, Retail and Transportation. These platforms were the foundation of digital transformation and use cases such as customer 360°, predictive maintenance, event driven applications and real-time analytics.

    Abdelkrim holds a PhD, MSc, and MSe degrees in computer science. He published several scientific papers at well-known IEEE and ACM journals. You can find him talking at Meetup or worldwide tech conferences such as DataWorks Summit, Strata or Flink Forward. He founded and runs the Future Of Data Meetup in Paris which is a group of 2300+ data and tech enthusiasts.
